item.title: Every week, Veolia. sends down a gang of people who come along and sweep nowhere., 1st July
item.description:
Veolia. A shit company that doesn't do their job correctly. No cleaning for at least five years.Today's date is the 1st of July 2025.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dorset Road, West Green, London

item.title: TFL trees are touching roof and blocking pathway in Archery lane .Front of houses.Mice and large spider are getting into houses ,because of this problem., 1st July
item.description:
Trees are touching roofs of houses and mive are getting into lofts and if windows are open large spiders from the trees are coming into windows.Lower bushes are blocking parts of pathways.Clarion housing say these trees being to TFL and to report it on this website.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A21, Bromley Common, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Green person and countdown lights not working, 1st July
item.description:
The green person and countdown signal is not working on the traffic lights at Horse Guards Avenue / Embankment. The green person doesn't light up when the red person signal goes out. The countdown doesn't operate and the the red person signal comes back on. Therefore there is no way to know when it is safe to cross the road as a pedestrian.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Victoria Embankment, Waterloo, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Front Door Fly Tipped, 1st July
item.description:
Number 162 Kingsground have had a new front door fitted and kindly dumped their old one against the railings in front of the drop down green. Along with the other mess like 2 fridge freezers in the usual spot. Getting ridiculous. It's clear where the door at least has come from, so for once RBG, make a visit and fine them for fly tipping.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 166,168, Kingsground, Middle Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grass Cutting and waste removal required, 1st July
item.description:
The grass next to the play area is overgrown. There are also bags full of waste and a lot of litter around. Would be great if the grass could be cut and the waste and litter removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12-14, Gateway, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Over the last several months I have reported this problem to Harringay, the slum landlord council., 1st July
item.description:
Hi, from Mr Webster, today's date 1st of July 2025. Thank you so much for getting back to me. I do appreciate it. As you can see from the two pictures, the first problem is flashing outside mine and my neighbours house. I do not want to discuss it, I do not want to be there. Just send someone down to fix it. End of story. Do not tell me when they are come in, do not notify me, just fix the job. Secondly, The second picture shows the light outside my neighbours house. Is being covered by a tree. It needs to be cut back significantly, approximately 25 feet from the top. cut Not trimmed. Feedback@haringey.gov.uk Rochelle Cassell Feedback & Resolutions Officer Feedback & Resolutions Team Reported this several times to different people. Nothing's been done. Repairs team run by an idiot. What do you expect? Today's date the 29th of June. #41 Dorset Rd and n 15. Five AJ.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dorset Road, West Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 167 KTR, 1st July
item.description:
Cast iron inspection chamber has been broken for months and it is surrounded by plastic barriers. Buses cannot approach the bus stop at an optimal angle while the barriers afford an unofficial parking space immediately to the south. Cyclists are forced into the main traffic stream.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 167-169, Kentish Town Road, Kentish Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet
